title: Mizusashi (Fresh water vessel)
text: Suzuki Sansei specializes in celadon ware. His highly refined, classical, light bluish-green glazes rival their Chinese Southern Sung prototypes and have garnered him many awards. This <I>mizusashi<I>, with its low profile and cool glaze, would be appropriate for a tea gathering conducted in the hot and humid summer months.
description: bowl-shaped vessel with two-part flat cover; blue glaze with red crackle effects
creditline: Gift of funds from the Friends of the Institute
